attributes.action: Create a Covid government cabinet of national unity to defeat Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: What ever method of calculation you use the UK is performing the worst in the world at protecting its citizens from Covid-19. It is therefore neccassary for a change in direction to utilise the best scientific minds in the world to provide some light at the end of the tunnel.
attributes.background: Have a bigger impact on both infection rates and deaths, bring in experience and expertise in dealing with viruses, to protect the health of the nation and in  the long term wealth of the nation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551504
